message:
SYSTEM: EWoT.pdf: Página 29
eWoT: A Semantic Interoperability Approach for Heterogeneous IoT Ecosystems Based on the Web of Things
Conclusions: eWoT
29
§  eWoT enables semantic interoperable ecosystems
o  Based on the Web of Things
•  Extended with the WoT-Mappings
o  Integration of IoT infrastructures requires only the 
registration of their Thing Descriptions
o  Offers a SPARQL endpoint to transparently query a set of 
heterogeneous IoT infrastructures
speaker: SYSTEM
